DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial demonstrate relative bioavailability 2 newly develop fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablets contain linagliptin & metformin single tablet linagliptin metformin administer singularly .
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability 2 Fixed Dose Combinations Linagliptin/Metformin Compared With Single Tablets
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Healthy male females 2 . Age 18 50 year ( incl ) 3 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 ( incl . ) 4 . Subjects must able understand comply study requirement Exclusion criterion : Any deviation healthy condition
